done.title: Files sent
description: The selected files have been successfully sent to
You can start another transfer to send more files or go back to the home page.

done.title: Files received
description: The files have been successfully received from
You can open the folder to view the files or go back to the home page.

login.title: Log In
login.historyDesc: All your transfers using the app will be saved on a history for easy access and management
login.syncDesc: Your transfer history will be synced across all devices using your account to keep it up to date
login.identificationDesc: When people receive files from you, your name will be displayed along the transfer (must be enabled on the account settings)

complete.title: Logging in
complete.loggingIn: Hang tight, we are logging you in...

confirm.title: Deleting Account
confirm.deleting: Deleting your SkyShare account, hang on tight...

dialog.unknownDesc: An unknown error occurred in the app or while trying to reach the server, this likely happened cause you're running an outdated version of SkyShare. Please make sure you're running the latest version and try again.
dialog.downDesc: Unable to reach the SkyShare server, please check your internet connection and try again.
dialog.tooManyFilesDesc: The maximum number of files has been exceeded! You can only send a maximum of {{amount}} files per transfer.
dialog.addingErrorDesc: An error occurred while adding {{amount}} of the selected files, check if they still exist and if their name is unique.
dialog.invalidCodeDesc: This code is not associated to an ongoing transfer. Please double-check it and try again.
dialog.senderDisconnectedDesc: The person that was sending you files has disconnected.
dialog.loginErrorDesc: An error occurred while logging you in, please try again.
dialog.logoutRequiredDesc: In order to change your username or password, SkyShare has to log you out of your account. Do you want to proceed?
dialog.editErrorDesc: An error occurred while saving some of your changes, please try again.
dialog.deleteConfirmDesc: Deleting your account will erase all your data in a irreversible way! Only proceed if you're sure about your decision.
dialog.deleteSuccessDesc: Your account has been successfully deleted. We hope to see you again soon!
dialog.deleteErrorDesc: An error occurred while deleting your account, please try again.
dialog.logoutDesc: Are you sure you want to log out?
